headline: Evaluating Charles Schwab’s (SCHW) Valuation as Client Trading Activity Rises for a Sixth Straight Month
summary: The latest Schwab Trading Activity Index reading, which climbed for a sixth straight month in November, puts Charles Schwab (SCHW) in an interesting spot for investors watching client behavior and the stock’s recent drift. See our latest analysis for Charles Schwab. That backdrop of strong client engagement helps explain why, even after some recent choppiness, Charles Schwab’s $94.28 share price sits on a solid footing, with a robust year to date share price return and healthy multi year...
